Direct-TO | January 2018 <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/flight-sentinel]]> GoDirect Flight Sentinel Briefing <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Jan2018/FootballJan18]]> <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Aug2017/IRS1Aug17]]>
Planning for the Big Game and Winter Olympics
Flight departments planning to fly to Super Bowl LII or the Winter Olympics in February will require some extra planning and coordination to ensure a successful, delay-free trip... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Jan2018/FootballJan18]]>
Global Customer Committee Update <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Jan2018/G650Jan18]]> G-650 TOLD Distance Calculation Error
An operator noticed the FMS on their G-650 was incorrectly reducing the takeoff runway available... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Jan2018/G650Jan18]]> Flight Services Update <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Jan2018/GoDirectJan18]]> Icing Avoidance
For many operators, the next few months will bring gusty winds, low ceilings, and icing conditions... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Jan2018/GoDirectJan18]]>
Pilot Gateway Update <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Jan2018/DTArchiveJan18]]> Newsletter Archive Now Available
Pilot Gateway users now have access to archived issues of the DIrect-TO Newsletter... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Jan2018/DTArchiveJan18]]>
